chunk:
Tropic Smoothing Cleanser, Unscented

Brand: Tropic

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: aloe barbadensis leaf juice, prunus amygdalus dulcis oil, simmondsia chinensis seed oil, cetearyl glucoside, cetearyl alcohol, glycerin, gluconolactone, persea gratissima oil, butyrospermum parkii butter, lecithin, citrus grandis seed extract, camellia sine

tract, camellia sinensis leaf extract, polyepsilon-lysine, tocopheryl acetate, sodium anisate, sodium levulinate, lactic acid

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
